column2: As soon as he was announced, I marked my calendar.&nbsp

column6: I am not an avid comic reader, but I do enjoy seeing Superheroes on screen.&nbsp
column7: His Smallville iteration was impressive as well and I cannot wait to see him make an appearance in the DC Movies.&nbsp

column1: If you missed him, grab him quickly on the second hand market.
column2: I hope he shows up in a set later.&nbsp
column3: We are going to need a Daily Planet, Fortress of Solitude, Wayne Manor, Gotham Museum of Technology and Science, and a Justice League Satellite Headquarters.&nbsp
column4: I think we still need the following villains
column6: Gorilla Grod (hulk style Figure), Braniac, Black Manta, Dark Seid, Doomsday, Sinestro and Metallo.&nbsp

column1: There is so much material to draw from with DC and I hope we get years and years worth of sets.
